row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
:set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_AGNET# = get_var(VARA.RBA.CONFIG,SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_AGENT,1) :set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_LOGIN# = get_var(VARA.RBA.CONFIG,SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_LOGIN,1) :set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE# = get_var(VARA.RBA.CONFIG,SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_PATH,1) :set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE# = str_cat(&SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#,"service_now_reply_") :set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE# = str_cat(&SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#,&METAFLOW_RUNID#) :set &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE# = str_cat(&SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#,".json") :publish &SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#,,TOP
!:send_msg "&$USER#","&$DEPARTMENT#","&SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#" ! :set &HND_LINE# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :set &LINE#='{' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"subject" : "ASO reply",' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"Service Request ID" : "&REQUEST_ID#",' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"ASO Metaflow Run ID" : "&METAFLOW_RUNID#",' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"Status" : "&METAFLOW_OK#",' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"Start time" : "&ENRICH#",' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#") :set &LINE#='"Reply time" : "&UPDATE_REQUEST#"' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#")
:set &LINE#='}' :set &RET# = put_process_line(&HND_LINE#,"&LINE#")
:set &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND_LINE#,&SERVICE_NOW_REPLY_FILE#,&$AGENT#,&$LOGIN#,OVERWRITE)
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND_LINE#
!@set retcode=%errorlevel% !@if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
